guide.title: Testing embeded YouTube with Markdown
guide.description: Can look cool if it works...

guide.title: Creating a Simple Blog using Vue + Markdown
guide.description: Simple and neat way to add a blogging feature to add on your website.

features.title: Posts are compiled with markdown-it
features.description: You can simply edit your markdownns online and your blog will reflect changes shortly after.

features.title: Use inline bootstrap-ready html
features.description: Another advantage of runtime template compilation is that we can make good use of bootstrap predefined classes since our app has already loaded all its css.
